metadata.title: CVE-2020-8251 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Node.js < 14.11.0 is vulnerable to HTTP denial of service (DoS) attacksbased on delayed requests submission which can make the server unable toaccept new connections.

criterions.comment: nodejs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
